 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁר‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==navel-string== (compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁוּרָא‎</span> [[Ezek.16.4|Ezek 16:4]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***id.***); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לאֹ כָרַּת שָׁרֵּךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.4|Ezek 16:4]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:22s»§ 22s</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 45</sup>) ***thy navel-string was nut cut***; questioned are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Prov.3.8|Prov 3:8]] ([[BDB#De|De]] and others ***navel***, synechd. for body, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַצְמוֺתֶתךָ‎</span>; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τῷ σώματι</span>; <span class="bdbLangGreek">σου</span>, compare [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]], Clericus [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Frankenb|Frankenb]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשָֽׂרְךָ‎</span>, [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]] and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאֵרְךָ‎</span>, Toy either); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרְרֵךְ‎</span> [[Song.7.3|Song 7:3]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὀμφαλάς σοὺ</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּטְנֵךְ‎</span>), = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרֵּךְ‎</span> [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others; now often interpreted as = ***vulva***, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***secret part***, [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] Stickel [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#Öt|Öttli]], noticed also by [[BDB#Thes|Thes]], but Arabism dubious, see [[BDB#Bu|Bu]].
